### getwd(): 

This function is used to get the current working directory being used by R.
```{r}
getwd()
```


### setwd(): 

```{r}
setwd("/Users/musubimanagement/Desktop/R-programme")
```

This function in R is used to change the path of current working directory and the path of the directory is passed as argument in the function.
